attributes.action: Make it mandatory for night clubs to use tumblrs with lids and straws.
attributes.additional_details: I believe the government need to take more actions in preventing women of our generation being in danger. And small things like my suggestion would help improve the risks of women being drugged and abused.
attributes.background: I want you to prevent the dangers of being spiked by enforcing nightclubs to use plastic reusable tumblrs with screw on lids and straws so drinks are not open to dangerous drugs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596308
